SRP.A: The peak of  ClipVibe is to the {left} of the peak of ProfConnect.

EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {ClipVibe} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =2.9?
EVJ.A: At X =2.9,the label with the highest density is {ProfConnect}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 6? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {SnapFrame}'s peak at {8},{Chirper}'s peak at {6},{GhostPic}'s peak at {8}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 5? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {ClipVibe}'s peak at {1},{ViewTube}'s peak at {1},{ProfConnect}'s peak at {1}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: SnapFrame or ViewTube?
NC.A: {SnapFrame} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: ClipVibe or ProfConnect?
NC.A: {ProfConnect} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: ClipVibe or ProfConnect?
NC.A: {ProfConnect} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {3} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {ProfConnect}
